{{Infobox record label

| genre = Electronic dance music, Progressive trance country = Netherlands
| location = Amsterdam url = [http://www.armadamusic.nl/ www.armadamusic.nl]
}} 'Armada Music' is a Dutch record label that specializes in releasing
electronic dance music, co-founded by Armin van Buuren.

Armada Music is an independent Dutch record company and was founded in June 2003
by Armin Van Buuren, Maykel Piron and David Lewis. "Armada" was formed from the
first two letters in each of the founding members' names. In 2013, Armada Music
celebrates its ten year anniversary. In 2009, 2010, 2011 and 2012, Armada Music
won the âBest Global Dance Labelâ title, as awarded by the International Dance
Music Awards.

The approach to combining everything music related in one company has attracted
several top names to the label such as; Chicane, Matt Darey, York, Roger Shah,
Paul Oakenfold, Paul van Dyk, Markus Schulz, Dash Berlin , Andy Moor, Gabriel &
Dresden & Max Graham, who are all responsible for the A&R activities of their
own label within Armada Music, while van Buuren himself deals with A&R
activities for the Armada labels 'Armind' and 'A State Of Trance'. Armada Music
has more than 25 different sub-labels representing many different types of
electronic music.
